value.title: UK’s plans for “first global summit” on AI safety draw criticism
value.excerpt: These worries were recently amplified by some AI experts likening the potential threats posed by AI to those of pandemics or nuclear weapons. "AI" has also been an extremely buzzy term in business recently.

value.title: Google Cloud and Salesforce partner to help improve customer experience with AI
value.excerpt: The two companies are coming together to analyze data with AI and help businesses create ads customers probably want to see.

value.title: LinkedIn is adding AI-powered tools to help marketing professionals
value.excerpt: LinkedIn has been quick to adopt generative AI tools on its platform, such as AI-generated Recruiter messages and profile sections, to help both businesses and professionals reach their goals. On Thursday, LinkedIn introduced AI-generated Copy Suggestions, powered by advanced OpenAI GPT models.

value.title: Segway partners with Drover AI, Luna to bring computer vision to e-scooters
value.excerpt: Segway-Ninebot is partnering with Drover AI and Luna Systems to integrate their sidewalk riding detection tech into its AI-enabled e-scooters.

value.title: Don't bank on AI predicting the stock market anytime soon
value.excerpt: The idea of artificial intelligence being able to predict the market is a pipe dream, according to Wall Street vet Marty Chavez. Here's why.

value.title: Qualcomm May Be a Hidden AI Winner, Says Analyst. Smartphone Chips Are Why.
value.excerpt: TD Cowen analyst Matthew Ramsay says chips within phones, such as those the company makes, could handle some of the processing for AI queries.

value.title: Introducing popularity tuning for Similar-Items in Amazon Personalize
value.excerpt: Amazon Personalize now enables popularity tuning for its Similar-Items recipe (aws-similar-items). Similar-Items generates recommendations that are similar to the item that a user selects, helping users discover new items in your catalog based on the previous behavior of all users and item metadata.

value.title: Introducing Google’s Secure AI Framework
value.excerpt: Today Google released released the Secure AI Framework to help collaboratively secure AI technology.

value.title: Celebrating World Oceans Day: Revitalizing the marine ecosystem with technology-driven engineered reefs to accelerate CO2 capture
value.excerpt:

value.title: Nvidia’s new AI “Superchip” combines CPU and GPU to train monster AI systems
value.excerpt: Early last week at COMPUTEX, Nvidia announced that its new GH200  "Superchip"—a combination CPU and GPU specifically created for large-scale AI applications—has entered full production. It's a beast.

value.title: To combat GPU shortage for generative AI, startup works to optimize hardware

value.title: AI And The Economy: What Has Changed?

value.title: Tesla’s AI Dreams May Already Be Priced Into Stock
value.excerpt: After an 82% year-to-date rally, Tesla shares trade at about 61 times forward earnings, compared with the mid-to-high single-digit multiples of auto stalwarts General Motors Co. and Ford Motor Co. Even current AI darling Nvidia Corp. trades at only 42 times.

value.title: Apple’s Vision Pro is the Retina display moment for headsets
value.excerpt: That was when Apple shipped its first-ever Retina display and Steve Jobs said that, once you use it, “you can’t go back.” It was something I couldn’t unsee, like looking through prescription glasses for the first time.
